column2: "That was amazing! I've heard the tales of your daring feats, but I must say, they pale in comparison to the real thing!"
"I would love to recommend the perfect class for someone of your incredible strength!"
"Might you have a minute, my dear?"
"Katori. We're not third-rate salesmen. Please refrain from ruining our reputation."
"Sir Saga, would you kindly refrain from interrupting me?"
"I am speaking to yours truly here."
"Allowing you to do as you please has been proven statistically detrimental to our assignments."
"As a fellow administrator, I cannot overlook your conduct."
"Yes, yes, I understand. You are about as nit-picky as my father in the most trivial of things."
"I am Saga, and this is Katori. We are the administrators for the newly authorized class, [Bouncer]."
"As you might have presumed, we are also in charge of its publicity."
"Katori took note of your prowess, and plotted to use you as a way to further that purpose."
"Sir Saga, would you please refrain from such misleading language!"
"I assure you that is unrelated! I have nothing but sincere adoration for your fine talent!"
"I couldn't help but dream of you becoming a Bouncer, and having the privilege of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder!"
"Bouncer, simply put, is a support class specializing in close-range."
"Its most distinctive feature are these weapons. The Jet Boots which I am using..."
"...And my Dual Blades make up the bulk of its arsenal."
"As this class is newly-established, we lack sufficient data, and are thus testing live combat."
"It would seem to me Sir Saga here wants the same thing I do. Why else the in-depth explanation, hm?"
"I am merely fulfilling my duty as an administrator. Time to go, Katori."
"Fi~ne. Well then, I look forward to our next encounter."
